segments.text: Doctor , what are some things I can do to stay as healthy as I can be ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to eat healthy foods and avoid unhealthy foods .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sometimes I don ’ t know what the best foods are .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fresh fruits and vegetables are important , along with protein and whole grains .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You don ’ t want to eat food that is high in fat . You need to avoid caffeine and sugar .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Beyond diet , what else can I do to be healthy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Getting 30 minutes of exercise a day is important . If you smoke , you need to stop .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about having a beer on the weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Less than a serving of alcohol a day can actually be good for you . Do not overdo it !
segments.speaker: S2
